EmailTemplate.subject: Important information about your LTA Membership!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
LTA Number: {!npe5__Affiliation__c.BTM_Number__c}
LTA Username: {!npe5__Affiliation__c.Login_Name__c}
Hi {!npe5__Affiliation__c.npe5__Contact__c},
We are writing to let you know we have been informed of a change in your relationship with {!npe5__Affiliation__c.npe5__Organization__c}. This is important to note because it may affect your LTA Membership.
A change in relationship is usually because you are no longer a member of your Venue. This change can be made either by yourself via the 'Member's Home' area or alternatively by your affiliated venue.
If this change hasn’t been made by yourself and you believe this has been done in error, you should contact your venue directly to discuss this.
You can also find further information on how to manage your affiliated venues by following the steps outlined in our Help and FAQs.
Lite Members
If you are a Lite Member and no longer linked to any other Venue, your LTA Membership will expire on 31 January 2021.
If your Lite Membership is linked to another registered LTA venue, your LTA Membership will remain active and no action is required.
If you have recently changed Venue, or are re-joining {!npe5__Affiliation__c.npe5__Organization__c}, don't forget to let us know by logging into your Member's Area and updating your account. If you do this before the expiry date, your Lite Membership will remain active.
Please note, if your membership does expire, you can re-join at any time via your Member's Area.
Team Members
If you are a Team Member, we will notify you when you're in your renewal period. You can find your expiry date in your online Member’s Area.
VISIT YOUR MEMBER'S AREA
We look forward to seeing you court side soon!
